metadata.title: CVE-2024-10004 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: Opening an external link to an HTTP website when Firefox iOS was previouslyclosed and had an HTTPS tab open could in some cases result in the padlockicon showing an HTTPS indicator incorrectly This vulnerability affectsFirefox for iOS < 131.2.

criterions.comment: mozjs102: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
mozjs115: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
